components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The AT&T network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 October 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 09 October 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T United States handsets.
